model.name: LV Spread Embroidery T-Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This classic t-shirt is given a distinctive twist with an embroidered motif in contrasting thread, featuring tiny scattered L and V letters that come together on the chest to create the contours of a larger LV. Made from compact cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, it has an inside-out construction and label on the back.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Black
  • Regular Fit 
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 36’’ / 92 cm, height 6' 0½’’ / 184 cm
  • Made in Italy
